Question.Department: Secretary of State for International Development
Question.Text: What recent steps she has taken to improve the humanitarian situation in Democratic Republic of Congo.

Question.Text: What recent assessment she has made of the humanitarian situation in Syria.

Question.Text: What progress her Department has made on its projects promoting women's rights and empowerment in Afghanistan.

Question.Text: What assessment she has made of the impact of Cyclone Phailin in India; and if she will make a statement.
